thread.title: Mr John McKellar
thread.title_full: TheShowerSealShop.com reviewed by Mr John McKellar

author: Mr John McKellar
title: Mr John McKellar
text:
We ordered this seal for the bath screen.
The only negative comment I have is that the emails outling the purchase didn't make it clear how much we had paid or what we had ordered.
It turned up OK five days after the order but I couldn't track it because when I ordered it I didn't have an account.
Then I registered for an account but it didn't allow me to track my order because the system didn't link that order with my new account.
